ModMetaData.name: Prisoner No Interaction Alert
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Adds an alert to the game (right side of the screen) when you have one or more prisoners whose interaction is set to "Maintain Only" and is not set to "Hemogen Farm". Ignores quest-related prisoners.
=== Updates === 03/21/2024: Update to 1.5
